text: @realDonaldTrump 71,921 Americans are DEAD as of 9:49 pm May 5 because YOU eliminated the pandemic protections President @BarackObama had in place and YOU refused to take the coronavirus seriously till mid-March! YOU are a genocidal, incompetent murderer and must be removed from office!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
